register.done: `{{fmUsername}}`, got it. You have been registered!
register.linked: You have a last.fm account linked to this account. If you want to change your username, use the `/unlinkfm` command first.

unlink.done: Your last.fm account has been unlinked.
unlink.notLinked: You don't have a last.fm account linked to this account.

help.text:
👋 Howdy. lastgram is a bot for last.fm users, allowing them to interact with the service through Telegram.

News, updates and more: https://t.me/lastgramdaily
Support and vibes: https://t.me/lastgramsupport

Use `/help <command>` to get more information about a command.
help.notFound: Command not found. Check the spelling and try again.
help.commandInfo:
Information for the **{{name}}** command
{{description}}

Usage: `{{- usage}}`

*Arguments between `< >` are required, while arguments between `[ ]` are optional.*

linkfm.link:
To link your account, click on the button below.
After connecting your last.fm account, click on the *$t(core:buttons.done)* button.
linkfm.success: Hey, `{{username}}`! Your last.fm account has been linked successfully.
linkfm.linkingError: Sorry, an error occurred while linking your account. Please try again.
linkfm.successWithUsername: Hey, `{{username}}`! Your last.fm account has been linked successfully, but the username you've set on the bot didn't match. I've set it to `{{username}}`, which is your real one.

config.donate: If you like the bot and want to donate to support its development, you can do so by clicking on the button below. Thank you!
config.lnConfig: Configure how your Last.fm information is displayed.
config.lnConfigUpdated: Your Last.fm display settings have been updated!

lovetrack.success:
❤️ Okay! I told last.fm that you loved listening to **{{track}}**.
It should show with a heart now.
lovetrack.notAnymore:
💔 Okay! I told last.fm that you don't love **{{track}}** anymore.
It should show without a heart now.
lovetrack.error: 🤔 Sorry, an error occurred while trying to love this track. Please try again.
lovetrack.notPlaying: 🤨 You need to be listening to a track to interact with it.

lyrics.noResult: 🤔 Sorry, I couldn't find the lyrics for this track.
lyrics.noArgs: 🤔 You need to provide a track name to get its lyrics.

crowns.noCrowns: You don't have any crowns in this group yet!

whoknows.claimCount_ordinal_one: 👑 You are the **first** to claim the crown for that artist here.
whoknows.claimCount_ordinal_two: 👑 You are the **{{count}}nd** to claim the crown for that artist here.
whoknows.claimCount_ordinal_few: 👑 You are the **{{count}}rd** to claim the crown for that artist here.
whoknows.claimCount_ordinal_other: 👑 You are the **{{count}}th** to claim the crown for that artist here.
success: {{- pretext}}🎉 You're now the holder of the crown for **{{artistName}}** here!
whoknows.error_notEnough: because you don't have enough scrobbles to take on the current crown holder.
whoknows.error_noScrobbles: because you don't have enough scrobbles to claim anything.
whoknows.error_alreadyHas: you already have the crown for this artist!
failure: {{- pretext}}❌ You weren't able to claim the crown for **{{artistName}}** because
whoknows.noScrobbles: 🤔 You didn't give me an artist name nor are you listening to anything right now. What do you want me to check?

unlinkfm.done: Your last.fm account has been successfully unlinked.
